name: Mr. Bojote Owns A Boat
description:
Available to download for PC/Mac and Android.

Adventure through a day in the life of Mr. Bojote, as he captains his boat through peaceful rivers, fast-paced racetracks, and even the bottom of the Ocean. Mr. Bojote, however, can’t captain on an empty stomach, so make sure to keep plenty of sandwiches stocked up for the journey ahead. 

This is my first ever full release Game and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it. If the game made you smile, maybe recommenced it to a friend and hopefully it will make them smile :)




Special thanks to 
pyro13djt for additional sounds
